mapper.select: select fk_employee_no, adcatgo, to_char(starttime,'hh24:mi') as starttime, to_char(endtime,'hh24:mi') as endtime from tbl_attendance where fk_employee_no = #{employee_no} and to_char(starttime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by starttime

select sum((endtime - starttime)*24*60) from tbl_attendance where fk_employee_no = #{employee_no} and to_char(starttime,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') group by (fk_employee_no,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select sum((endtime - starttime)*24*60) from tbl_attendance where fk_employee_no = #{employee_no} and starttime between TRUNC(sysdate,'iw') and TRUNC(sysdate,'iw')+6 group by (fk_employee_no,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select asno, title, writeday, profile_systemfilename, name_kr from ( select row_number() over(order by writeday desc) as rno, asno, fk_empno, profile_systemfilename, substr(title,0,8)||'..' as title, round((sysdate - writeday)*24*60*2) as writeday, A.name_kr from tbl_approval A join tbl_approval_sign aps on A.ano = aps.fk_ano join tbl_employee on employee_no = A.fk_empno where signdate is null and fk_sign_empno = #{employee_no} ) where rno in (1,2)
select count(*) from ( select row_number() over(order by writedate desc)as rno, nbno, name_kr, subject, content, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') as writedate from tbl_notice_board )

select nbno, name_kr, subject, content, writedate from ( select row_number() over(order by writedate desc)as rno, nbno, name_kr, subject, content, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') as writedate from tbl_notice_board ) where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select count(*) from ( select row_number() over(order by writedate desc) as rno, fk_employee_no, fbno, F.name_kr, department_name, subject, content, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') as writedate from tbl_free_board F join v_employee V on fk_employee_no = employee_no )

select fbno, name_kr, department_name, subject, content, writedate from ( select row_number() over(order by writedate desc) as rno, fk_employee_no, fbno, F.name_kr, department_name, subject, content, to_char(writedate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') as writedate from tbl_free_board F join v_employee V on fk_employee_no = employee_no ) where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
